record.description: District and local chairmen attended a conference at the University of Chicago to outline various phases of the campaign. Some 100 Alumni were in attendance, and many sections of the country were represented. The picture shows the group at Kent Laboratory just after a visit and while on a tour of the university during the morning. The tour served to emphasize many of the university's pressing needs.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: UC magazine stamps. Caption from frontispiece of April, 1925 issue of UC Magazine, pp. 224.
